alert.note: Alert for Whitman (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 25 at 3:26PM PST until December 28 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Spokane WA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Washington...Idaho... Paradise Creek at Moscow affecting Whitman and Latah Counties. .Heavy rain may fall on a deep primed snowpack leading to the melt increasing. Flows in rivers may increase quickly and reach critical levels. For the Paradise Creek ...including Moscow...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Paradise Creek at Moscow. * WHEN...From late Monday night to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 9.2 feet, Water will be out of the creek at the intersection of Bridge Street and Hillcrest Drive and may also be flowing into the intersection at this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM PST Sunday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 9.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 530 AM PST.
